title: 'Twas the Night B'Fore Christmas: An African-American Version
description: "'Twas the night b'fore Christmas, when all 'round the house, not a critter was stirrin', not even a mouse." So begins this charming adaptation of Clement C. Moore's timeless poem, richly illustrated in full color, with images of a black family at the turn of the century.
author: Melodye Benson Rosales
